item.title: [HELP] Pi based server / Adding highscores
item.dc:creator: @Eraa Eraa
item.description:
@Eraa wrote:

Heres the link to the tutorial

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Okay so basically I’m near the end of the tutorial now it asks me to find my logout method In client.java which I did succesfully :D, Here is my logout method:

[code]public void logout() {
synchronized (this) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - logoutDelay > 10000) {
outStream.createFrame(109);
properLogout = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“You must wait 10 seconds before logging out.”);

        } 
    }
}[/code]

Now I have to add this to my logout method explained in the guide if you have a look:

SQL.createConnection(); SQL.saveHighScore(this); SQL.destroyConnection();

No matter where abouts in my logout method I add that code i always get errors, Can anyone help me or point me in the right direction! Thanks alot!!

PS: Here are the errors i get when compiling after adding the above code:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:321: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class server.model.players.Client SQL.createConnection(); ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:322: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class server.model.players.Client SQL.saveHighScore(this); ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:323: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class server.model.players.Client SQL.destroyConnection(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
